messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hiyah!
There’s no holding anything back!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I... I concede!
I think you’re on a different level...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Hiyah! You put me in my place!
I appreciate it!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Hiyah! This time, there really is no
holding anything back!
